hi I'm happy you're listening in this
video we are going to learn about long
vowel sounds but first we have to talk
about the magic e it is also called the
silent e if you add an e to the end of
the word the short vowel sound in the
middle of the word magically changes to
a long vowel sound we do not say the e
because it is silent for example rat rat
uses the short a sound ah but if we add
an e at the end of the word it becomes
raped rate uses a long a sound a but
take away the E and it goes back to rat
another example is sit sit uses a short
I sound it but if we add an e at the end
of the word it becomes site site uses
the long I sound I now take away the e
and it becomes sit again
let's review rat rate sit site I hope
you understand let's practice some more
